      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_6c0f734840e8f4139482bee22c78455d319a34c4</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_6c0f734840e8f4139482bee22c78455d319a34c4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Capacitors in parallel storing different amount of charges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensatoren in der Ähnlichkeit, die 
unterschiedliche Menge Ladungen speichert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Condensateurs en parallèle enregistrant la 
quantité différente de frais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capacitores na paralela que armazena uma 
quantidade diferente de cargas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condensatori parallelamente che memorizza 
quantità differente di spese</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικό ποσό καταχώρησης πυκνωτών παράλληλα 
παράλληλο δαπανών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Condensadores en el paralelo que salva diversa 
cantidad de cargas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when two capacitors are connected in parallel, they have the same potential difference across them but store different amount of charges.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capacitors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential difference</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß, wenn zwei 
Kondensatoren in der Ähnlichkeit angeschlossen werden, sie den 
gleichen möglichen Unterschied über ihnen haben, aber speichert 
unterschiedliche Menge Ladungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand deux 
condensateurs sont reliés en parallèle, ils ont la même différence
potentielle à travers eux mais enregistre la quantité différente de
frais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando dois 
capacitores são conectados na paralela, têm a mesma diferença 
potencial através delas mas armazena uma quantidade diferente de 
cargas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando due 
condensatori sono collegati parallelamente, hanno loro la stessa 
differenza potenziale ma memorizza la quantità differente di spese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν δύο 
πυκνωτές είναι συνδεδεμένος παράλληλα παράλληλος, έχουν την 
ίδια πιθανή διαφορά σε τους αλλά το διαφορετικό ποσό 
καταστημάτων δαπανών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando dos 
condensadores están conectados en paralelo, tienen la misma 
diferencia potencial a través de ellas pero salva diversa cantidad de
cargas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensatoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parallelschaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">condensadores</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">cargas</string>
